meanings.definition: A thing that is known or proved to be true.
meanings.sent1: The teacher shared an interesting fact about dinosaurs with the class.
meanings.sent2: It is a fact that the Earth revolves around the Sun.
meanings.sent3: In a surprising fact, the cat was afraid of the tiny mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a fact of pure joy that brightened the room.
meanings.sent5: The fact that water freezes at 0 degrees Celsius is important to remember.

meanings.sent1: The fact of the matter is that we need to finish this project by Friday.
meanings.sent2: The fact of his presence made her heart race with excitement.
meanings.sent3: In the world of fiction, the fact of magic existing was thrilling.
meanings.sent4: The fact of the storm approaching sent everyone into a frenzy of preparation.
meanings.sent5: The fact of friendship is a treasure that should be cherished.
